titleStmt.title: An abridgement of all sea-lavves Gathered forth of all writings and monuments, which are to be found among any people or nation, upon the coasts of the great Ocean and Mediterranean Sea. And specially ordered and disposed for the use and benefit of all benevolent sea-farers, within his Majesties dominions of Great Brittain, Ireland, and the adjacent isles thereof. By William Welvvod, professor of the civill lawe.
titleStmt.author: Welwood, William, fl. 1578-1622.

titleStmt.title: An abridgement of all sea-lavves Gathered forth of all writings and monuments, which are to be found among any people or nation, upon the coasts of the great Ocean and Mediterranean Sea. And specially ordered and disposed for the use and benefit of all benevolent sea-farers, within his Majesties dominions of Great Brittain, Ireland, and the adjacent isles thereof. By William Welvvod, professor of the civill lawe.
titleStmt.author: Welwood, William, fl. 1578-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [Thomas Harper for] the assignes of Ioane Man and Benjamin Fisher,

notesStmt.note: An expanded and revised version of: The sea-law of Scotland (STC 25242).
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
Some print show-through; some pages cropped and tightly bound.
